Subseries D: International Ladies' Garment Workers' Union.
Subseries D: International Ladies' Garment Workers' Union.

International Ladies' Garment Workers' Union (Reel 2, Part 1: Frames 244-279): Consists largely of minutes of the Waist Makers Conference in New York City, 1910-11, of which Schneiderman was secretary.
